According to legend, Lucifer was the brightest angel in Heaven, who rose too close to God and learned a new truth, perhaps a [[paradox]], or even a parallel to Adam and Eve's temptation and exile from [[Eden]]. Finally God had the last straw with Lucifer (now Satan) and cast him down to Earth where he lived with mortals for a time before forming his own version of Heaven, [[Hell]]. According to Matthew 25:41,46 Hell was prepared as a place for the Devil and his angels, to be in everlasting fire, not as a place to rule.
